alert.note: Alert for Cayuga; Oswego; Wayne (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 3:19PM EDT until July 24 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Buffalo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Wayne County in western New York... Cayuga County in central New York... Southwestern Oswego County in central New York... * Until 415 PM EDT. * At 318 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Clyde, or 14 miles southwest of Fair Haven Beach State Park, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Oswego, Fulton, Fair Haven Beach State Park, Clyde, Sodus, Weedsport, Cato, Chimney Bluffs State Park, Battle Island State Park, and Volney. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
